short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension searches the code coverage and class names in the Salesforce Developer Console.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Apex Coverage Inspector is the ultimate productivity tool for Salesforce developers, designed to eliminate the frustration of scrolling through endless lists to find code coverage details. With its intuitive interface and lightning-fast performance, this Chrome extension empowers developers to quickly search for Apex classes, view their coverage, and focus on what truly matters—delivering quality code and seamless deployments.

- Key Features of Apex Coverage Inspector
1. Quick Search for Apex Classes: Instantly locate specific Apex classes without the hassle of endless scrolling.
2. Instant Code Coverage Details: Access coverage data with a single click, saving time and effort.
3. Boosts Developer Productivity: Streamline workflows and meet tight deadlines effortlessly.
4. User-Friendly Interface: Clean, intuitive design tailored for Salesforce developers.
5. Seamless Salesforce Integration: Designed to work flawlessly with the Salesforce Developer Console.


Note: If the extension isn’t working, please try refreshing the page.
